rules_text: Deadeye – {1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Eldoria Sureshot. [i](The first time this deals combat damage to a player each turn, you may activate this ability. It costs {0} if this is equipped.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The ghost town of Eldoria was a bustling merchant hub until the Ar'Ghel usurped its trade routes. It now serves as a home for misfits, outcasts, and exiles trying to make themselves anew.[/i]
